channel.title: recon on Stefan Tobler
channel.description: Recent content in recon on Stefan Tobler

item.title: Vulnversity
item.description: Vulnversity walks through how to preform recon on targets and look for possible points of entry for payloads such as reverse shells. On this box port 3333 is running a webserver. After dirbusting the webserver we find a path called internal where we are able to upload php files.
